text: thumb|Arabian Desert The Arabian Desert is a desert in western Asia. It is on most of the Arabian Peninsula. It covers . Most people in this area are Arabs. The main language is Arabic, and the main religion is Sunni Islam. == Countries == The countries in The Arabian Desert are: * Bahrain * Kuwait * Oman * Qatar * Saudi Arabia * The United Arab Emirates * Yemen == Wildlife == Gazelles, oryx, sand cats, and spiny-tailed lizards live in parts of the Arabian Desert. However, very few animals live in the Rub' al Khali in the middle of the desert. == Related pages == * Desert * Arabian Peninsula * Middle East * Western Asia ==Other websites== Category:Deserts of Asia Category:Ecoregions
title: Arabian Desert
